body: Hinasaki Yo's art is beautiful and a nice little story here. I agree too, quite an unexpected short sequel by Izure like a kind of omake, extra or after story. For those wondering about the earlier parts, here: Part 1(english, first story): https://nhentai.net/g/338635/ #### Part 2(raw, first story): https://nhentai.net/g/333668/
another beauty by Hinasaki Yo and unexpected sequel by Izure
